CanvasInterface package
========================================

------------------------------------------------------
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 4

   graph/CanvasBase
   graph/Events

------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------

   :maxdepth: 4

   graph/WaveData

   graph/Contour

------------------------------------------------------

   :maxdepth: 4
